# 报告说明

```{r contexts-building, results="asis", echo=FALSE}
as_tibble(descriptions$context) %>%
  mutate(md = render_title_content(title, content, hlevel = 2, glue = TRUE, .open = "<<", .close = ">>")) %>%
  pull(md) %>%
  paste(collapse = "\n\n") %>%
  cat()
```

## 学生参加测评的情况

```{r info-report, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
switch(
  opts$type,
  school = glue(
    "* 测评学校：{school_name}",
    "* 测评时间：{test_date_string}",
    "* 实测人数：{n_distinct(scores_school$userId)}人",
    .sep = "\n"
  ),
  district = glue(
    "* 学校数目：{n_distinct(scores_district$school)}",
    "* 测评时间：{test_date_string}",
    "* 实测人数：{n_distinct(scores_district$userId)}人",
    .sep = "\n"
  )
) %>%
  cat()
```
